Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are high temperature fuel cells with a strong potential for stationary power house applications.
Titulo: System Identification and Nonlinear Model Predictive Control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: However, considerable challenges need to be overcome to connect these cells to the power grid.
Titulo: System Identification and Nonlinear Model Predictive Control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The fluctuating grid demand has to be met without sacrificing the cell efficiency and causing structural/material damage to the system.
Titulo: System Identification and Nonlinear Model Predictive Control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: This requirement coupled with fast and highly nonlinear transients of the transport variables results in a challenging control problem.
Titulo: System Identification and Nonlinear Model Predictive Control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: This paper is on synthesizing a controller that can address some of these challenges.
Titulo: System Identification and Nonlinear Model Predictive Control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: For using in the model predictive controller (MPC), input output models are identified from the data generated by a detailed dynamic model.
Titulo: System Identification and Nonlinear Model Predictive Control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: A traditional SISO control and a novel MIMO control are considered here.
Titulo: System Identification and Nonlinear Model Predictive Control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: In the SISO control problem, power is the controlled variable (CV) and H-2 flow is the manipulated variable (MV).
Titulo: System Identification and Nonlinear Model Predictive Control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: In the MIMO control problem, power and the utilization factor (UF) of the fuel are the CVs while voltage and the flow of H-2 are the MVs.
Titulo: System Identification and Nonlinear Model Predictive Control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The identification study shows that the nonlinear NAARX models with properly chosen cross terms can improve the model performance significantly in a MIMO problem.
Titulo: System Identification and Nonlinear Model Predictive Control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The results from the control study indicate that a well-tuned proportional integral derivative (PM) controller is sufficient for the single input single output (SISO) power control of a tubular SOFC.
Titulo: System Identification and Nonlinear Model Predictive Control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: It also shows that the mutiple input multiple output (MIMO) control of power and the UF is highly interactive and necessitates a nonlinear model predictive controller (NMPC).
Titulo: System Identification and Nonlinear Model Predictive Control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Without using any additional hardware such as an ultracapacitor or battery pack, the designed NMPC could satisfy a step change in load with acceptable overshoot in power and the UF.
Titulo: System Identification and Nonlinear Model Predictive Control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: A well-tuned PID controller is found to perform poorly for the MIMO problem.
Titulo: System Identification and Nonlinear Model Predictive Control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: On the basis of these findings, future work will focus on the development of nonlinear predictive control approaches for stack-level control of tubular solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: System Identification and Nonlinear Model Predictive Control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
